messages.subject: Re: tsuba shinsa question
messages.msgSnippet: ... not too severely damaged and everything else about the guard is good, I think it would pass, however the point level would be significantly lower than for
messages.messageBody:
--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "Jim Gilbert" <jggilbert@E...>
wrote:
> Milt,
> I think that Matt is correct. As long as the 1/3 of one side is
not too severely damaged and everything else about the guard is good,
I think it would pass, however the point level would be significantly
lower than for the same guard in overall good condition. If the rust
is bad and/or the guard is only ordinary quality, you might be
looking at a shinteisho level paper (60-69 points). If it was a much
better than average tsuba and the rust isn't too bad, a kanteisho
might be possible. It depends on just what levels of quality and
condition you have.
>
> Jim
>
>
>


jim und all,
tsuba in question can be viewed
at..............http://tinyurl.com/rtsx

last 5 pics, labelled shinsa

milt

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] tsuba shinsa question
messages.msgSnippet: Milt, I think that Matt is correct.  As long as the 1/3 of one side is not too severely damaged and everything else about the guard is good, I think it would
messages.messageBody:
Milt,
I think that Matt is correct. As long as the 1/3 of one side is not too severely damaged and everything else about the guard is good, I think it would pass, however the point level would be significantly lower than for the same guard in overall good condition. If the rust is bad and/or the guard is only ordinary quality, you might be looking at a shinteisho level paper (60-69 points). If it was a much better than average tsuba and the rust isn't too bad, a kanteisho might be possible. It depends on just what levels of quality and condition you have.

Jim



gang,
we all know the NTHK und NBTHK have " different " policy in pinkie
submitted items.

NTHK is more " hang up " on condition, ja ?

Assuming I have a tsuba made by a good maker ( not gimei ) ,
condition is good on the omote side ( where the mei is ) but the ura
side has rust damage ( 1/3 area ).
What's the chance it will pass/get pinkied ?

Milt

messages.messageBody:

That would seem logical to me.

Matt
